attributes.action: pass legislation that all British airlines must provide adequate legroom for passengers especially those on package holidays.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
People save all year to provide a holiday for themselves and family.They have to queue up for hours for the necessary 'evil'of security checks.Only
to find that when they eventually board their flight they are packed in like sardines in a can.Is this 21st century?
